## ExternalTranslationLoaderOptions.(constructor)

Creates instance of ExternalTranslationLoaderOptions

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
constructor(resourcePrefix: string, resources: string[], resourceSufix: string);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  resourcePrefix | <code>string</code> | Prefix that is used for all requests |
|  resources | <code>string[]</code> | Names of resources that holds translations |
|  resourceSufix | <code>string</code> | Sufix that is used for all requests |
